newsletter.title: Newsletter
newsletter.description: Subscribe for updates and exclusive offers

hero.title: Personalization and elegance in every detail
hero.subtitle: Transform every gift into a unique and elegant experience with our personalized arrangements

about.title: Who We Are
about.description1: GiftySignature was born with the purpose of transforming each gift into a unique and elegant experience. We create custom boxes, bouquets, and baskets, combining fresh flowers with carefully selected items chosen by our clients.
about.description2: Our goal is to provide a touch of class and attention to detail to celebrate special moments, making each gift an unforgettable memory.

customDesign.title: Custom Design
customDesign.description: Each creation is designed to adapt to the client's needs, choosing colors, styles, and details that are perfectly coordinated.

refinedPackaging.title: Refined Packaging
refinedPackaging.description: We use ribbons and accessories that harmonize with the chosen product, creating an unforgettable unboxing experience.

collaborations.title: Collaborations
collaborations.description: We collaborate with various partners to bring unique and exclusive products, ensuring a diverse and high-quality selection for our customers.

contact.title: Create Your Perfect Gift
contact.subtitle: Let us help you create a unique and personalized gift experience. Contact us to start designing your perfect arrangement.

ContactPage.title: Contact Us
ContactPage.description: We'd love to hear from you. Whether you have a question about our products, need help with a custom order, or just want to say hello, don't hesitate to reach out.
